name: Shell Template - Windows 11
description:
The Windows 11 Shell Template is a recreation of the shell elements found in Windows 11.


Included in this file:


  • Taskbar (Centered and Left Aligned)
  • App Indicators (Rest, Selected, Attention etc)
  • Jump Lists
  • Taskbar Hover Flyouts (Search & Task View)
  • Start Menu
  • Search
  • Quick Settings
  • Notification Center
  • Microsoft Teams Chat
  • Widgets Pane


Everything is created from scratch in Figma by hand. To make this as accurate as possible, all of the materials, fonts, colors and controls are taken from Microsoft's Windows UI Figma toolkit.


Feel free to use this in your projects. Attribution is not necessary. But if you want to give it, it will really be appreciated :)


If there are any issues or if you have any suggestions, then drop a DM on my Twitter. I also post Windows-related content there so a follow will really be appreciated! üòÅ
